results.title: Live Laugh Love - Candle Gift Set - Wedding Candle - 8oz  Soy Candles - Housewarming Gift  - Mother's Day Gift Candles - Engagement Gift
results.description:
Housewarming Gift - Birthday Gift For Mom - Wedding Gift for Couple - Mother's Day Gift 

The "Live Laugh Love" Inspirational Gift Set is a wonderful gift for Christmas, Birthdays, Weddings or any occasion. You will receive all 3 candles and you also get to choose the scent you would like. You can choose 1 scent for all candles or you can choose 3 different scents. It's your choice! We have many scents to choose from. When placing your order, just message me in the "Notes to Seller" section at checkout with what scents you would like.

If this is a gift and you would like your candle sent directly to the recipient, just notate their name and address in the "Shipping" section.  

Lavender

Caribbean Teakwood

Apples Maple Bourbon

Very Vanilla

Sunwashed Linen

Love Spell

Birthday Cake

Hawaiian Sunrise

Green Apple Essence 

Apple Cinnamon

Smoky Mountain Pine

Coconut Mango

Fresh Cut Roses

Black Raspberry Vanilla

Wedding Cake

Georgia Peach

Cedar and Sand 

Mistletoe

Christmas Tree

Almond Biscotti

 Sunset Beach

White Tea & Ginger 

Bamboo and Orchid 

Eucalyptus Spearmint 

Our natural soy wax candle is homemade, hand poured and comes in a beautiful 8oz Mason jar with a pewter lid and decorative twine. Burn time for each candle is approx. 40-50 hrs.
Measurements:
3.5" tall
3" width

I hand pour each and every candle in small batches with the greatest care of applying only quality scents to each batch. Most importantly all candles are highly scented (using the maximum amount of scent that the soy wax will allow) and also clean burning so that you get the most out of your candle. My candles are made with 100% natural soy wax. Soy wax is Eco friendly and burns without creating soot or smoke unlike other waxes. I also use only Cotton Wicks that are lead and zinc free. Once you have completely burned your candle, you are left with a reusable mason jar that can be used for many different purposes. 

Thank you for your interest in my candles. If you have any questions or issues, please message me. My goal is to provide a high quality product and excellent customer service. We cannot be held responsible for incorrect shipping addresses. Please review this before placing your order. If you feel as though you have given us the incorrect shipping address, please notify us immediately with the correct information before we have shipped your package.

If you like our candles and want to see more, just follow this link to our Etsy Shop:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/DawnCandleWorx?ref=seller-platform-mcnav

Click on the link below to see our full Scent Description List:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/702321688/scent-description-list-not-intended-for?ref=shop_home_active_3&frs=1

results.title: Morse Code 'Live, Laugh, Love' Bracelet
results.description:
A morse code bracelet that spells 'Live, laugh, Love' in Morse Code dots and dashes.

Remind someone of life's joys with this Morse Code ' Live, Laugh, Love' bracelet. It makes a thoughtful and unusual gift that can be worn as a reminder of your positive words.

PLEASE READ THIS VERY IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

NON-UK based customers MUST select "International Signed" as their delivery option if they are purchasing the bracelet in STERLING SILVER. We are unable to send any sterling silver products un-signed for due to the value of the product.


US / CANADA / AUSTRALIA / Other NON-European countries:

Etsy say 3-7 days Royal Mail (UK postal service) . This is unrealistic. It takes about a week not less. HOWEVER my experience is that 15 % of the time it can take up to 3 weeks and very occasionally up to 2 months. I ask that when you make your order you email me at the same time to confirm you agree to this. If you do not email us we cannot process your order. Sorry. 

Now available with sterling silver, rose gold plated or silver plated beads on grey rope.

Perfect for anyone who is happy and positive but also for anyone who needs encouragement to be more so.

This will be sent to you in a gift box with an card, all ready to pass on as a gift.

There is other Morse code jewellery available in separate listings

made from:
'satin' cord and sterling silver, silver plated or rose gold plated beads

dimensions:
Adjustable to any size.

results.title: Live Laugh Love F**k Off - Cross Stitch Pattern (PDF Download)
results.description:
This listing is for an Instant Download of the pattern.

Please note that the blue heart is not part of the pattern, it is only there to censor the word.

Also included as an extra PDF available to download along with this pattern is my Cross Stitch and Blackwork Guide.

PATTERN MEASUREMENTS AND INFORMATION

Width: 146 stitches
Height: 91 stitches 

14 Count Aida: 10.4in x 6.5in (26.5cm x 16.5cm)
16 Count Aida: 9.1in x 5.7in (23.2cm x 14.4cm)
18 Count Aida: 8.1in x 5.1in (20.6cm x 12.8cm)
20 Count Aida: 7.3in x 4.6in (18.5cm x 11.6cm)

Plus you should leave a border of about 3 inches around all sides of the pattern.


Floss Colours: 2 DMC (310 & 666)


Types of Stitches: Cross Stitch (full stitches only)


This pattern is not for commercial use, it is for personal use only:

results.title: Electric Guitar Art Today is a Good Day Motivational Quotes, Watercolor Art Canvas Print
results.description:
💕 PRODUCT INFORMATION
Gallery quality canvas print displays vibrant artwork that is built to last. Printed with HP Latex Inks that are fade resistant. Inks are water based and solvent free so rest assured there are no harsh chemicals in your home. Assembled with 3/4" thick wood frame and glued wood core stretcher bars.

All canvas prints are wrapped and shipped in fitted packaging
• Ready To Hang - Mounting hardware comes attached.
• Leveling Bumpers Included - For wall protection.
• Semi-Gloss Print - Increased vibrancy of artwork.
• Beveled Wood Stretch Bars - Make frame less noticeable on front of canvas.
• Industrial Strength Staples - Ensure a tight fit that is sure to last.

💕  How do I take care of returns, exchanges or product issue? 💕 
💕 TRACKING SHOWS ARRIVED
There’s not a whole lot we can do when the tracking info shows it as being delivered. Please check with everyone in your household as someone else might have brought it in. Sometimes we have heard of a package going to a neighbor mistakenly or being left at a different/side door. In our experience, usually the package is located.
Most orders are shipped via UPS Mail Innovations or UPS Surepost, and final delivery is by the USPS so we also suggest having the customer contact their local post office and many times they can get in touch with the actual person who delivered it and see if they recall where they left it. It’s best to do that soon after it’s marked as delivered.
💕 NO TRACKING OR NO MOVEMENT
If a package does not show any movement and has passed the allotted time for delivery we will send a new package at our cost to the customer.  We may ask you to check to very the address or supply us with a new shipping address.
SIZING EXCHANGE
We don't offer exchanges or refunds in those situations.
💕 PRODUCT ISSUE
If it is an issue on our end where we sent out the wrong product, wrong size, bad graphic just send us a picture of what you have  received for quality control purposes and we can offer a refund or replacement once the issue is deemed our fault.
US customers have up to 30 days after the shipped date and international customers have up to 60 days after the shipped date.
What we need to make a replacement order:
1.	Please provide the name and email.
2.	Please provide the order number.
3.	Please provide picture of wrong/ damaged item And Shipping Label.
Once we receive this we will print a replacement product and send it right out!

results.title: Dainty Name Charm Necklace, Chain & Wire-wrapped Pearl. Mini Disc, Customize, Personalize, Couples, Lover, Initials, Monogram, Heart Tag BFF
results.description:
This listing is for:

One mini 1/2" disc
Any length up to 24" bead-ball chain*
Wire-wrapped loop, Freshwater pearl

*Tell me your preferred length during checkout or it may vary. Dainty 1.5mm ball chains use small tube closures and are sent by default. You can request a thick 2.5mm chain which includes a bigger tube. Or upgrade your chain to include a lobster clasp by adding this to your cart:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/197057806/upgrade-your-ball-chain-with-connectors


Order more discs by adding more charms to your cart along with your necklace:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/124872297/lots-of-options-customize-your-own


DURING CHECKOUT:
1.) What color metal for the disc: copper, silver or gold?
2.) What is the word or date?
3.) What font size do you want?
4.) What color chain do you want? 
5.) What length, anything up to 24". If you do not specify I will send a random length. You can trim the length at home with regular scissors.


FONT SIZE RESTRICTIONS:
"soul" is 1/16th inch Lowercase Typewriter (maximum 4 characters across)
"chase" is 1/16th inch Lowercase Gothic (maximum 5 characters across)
1/16th inch Uppercase will allow 5 characters across (a date may have six)
1/8th inch Uppercase will allow 3 characters across
1/4th inch Large Uppercase will allow 1 character across


You can also request a symbol, here are photo samples:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/124872297/lots-of-options-customize-your-own

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE CHARM:
° This listing is for one set of initials, a monogram, one short word, one short name or one date on your charm.

THE WORD:
° Check out all the examples in the photos. You'll be able to figure out which font size you like best (depending on word length).
° You can use one name, a date, initials, add a heart between letters. I welcome your creative ideas, but please request similar to what you see in the photos.
° You can mix up font sizes, just be really specific during checkout so I can stamp it like you want.

THE CHAIN & PEARL:
° Any length up to 24" chain is included. 
° The freshwater pearl may vary in size and texture. It will be a cream or white color.
° Let me know if you want Silver, Antique Copper, Gold, Black* or Gunmetal* ball chain. Regular silver is usually sent by default. *Colors may be limited availability. Dainty chain has a small tube closure.^

^Dainty ball chains use small tube closures. You can request a thick chain which includes a bigger tube. Or upgrade your chain to include a lobster clasp by adding this to your cart:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/197057806/upgrade-your-ball-chain-with-connectors

HAND-STAMPING & ANTIQUING:
° Each charm is hand-stamped and antiqued by me. The letters won't line up perfectly, and each one will be thoroughly unique (like you!). The metals are antiqued along with the stamped letters, each charm will vary in darkness, marks, etc.
° If you select the wrong sized font for how many letters you need stamped, due to space restriction, a different font may be used for you.

MONOGRAMS:
A monogram means that you put the Last name initial in the middle, and it will be larger than the other letters. This is the order of initials: First name, LAST name, Middle name
Be very specific during checkout notes if you want this.


NOTES:
More quantities can be custom ordered.

Always ask if you have an idea, and I can let you know how we can make it work :)

>>>>> See lots of other charm photos at:
http://www.facebook.com/#!/media/set/?set=a.433303059491.206896.60001389491&type=1


Add a gift box for $1.50 ~ locate the listing in my "charms" section.
http://www.etsy.com/listing/87485110/add-a-gift-box-to-your-existing-order

...............................................................................................................

Please visit my shop policies for more information.

PLEASE NOTE: Your jewelry will look its best and last longer if you do not wear it in the water.
...............................................................................................................

★FOR STAMPING ON THE BACK OF A CHARM:
★★★INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PAY FOR ADDITIONAL STAMPING FEES:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/80281037/add

results.title: Live Laugh Love svg, Laugh svg, Wedding svg, Love svg, Love dxf, Cricut Design, Tote Bag or T-Shirt Design, Silhouette Cameo Design
results.description:
Hello from BennyB Studio and thanks for stopping by! 

This Live, Laugh, Love design is perfect for a friend, family member or any loved one. You can make a shirt, tote bag, coffee tumbler and more transfer easily by printing onto iron on transfer paper that you can buy at any craft store or online. Customize the design with your own team name by using your font or one of the recommend ones we have included on our font information PDF. We have included a separate file to add roses to the sleeves. You can also print your own stickers, cards or shirt and cut them with your cutter! These easy to print or cut designs make perfect gifts for friends, family members, co-workers and more. A  PDF with Free font information and how to use our files is included. 

This listing is for files that will INSTANTLY DOWNLOAD with payment.

* All files are cut files that are ready to cut in SVG or DXF (eps included also)

• All of these designs are also ready to print for making shirt iron ons, framing, making cards, stickers party decorations, mugs, tote bags, etc. (png and jpeg).

The file comes in a folder and is saved several different ways. You will receive:
• SVG for your Cutter
• DXF for your Cutting Machines or other cutting machines
• EPS
• PDF
• PNG to be used as clipart
• JPG for printables or iron on transfers

They can be used by cutting cutting machines other programs that are compatible with SVG files. These are very smooth, high quality files that have been professionally digitized.

Commercial use is allowed up to 125 times per listing bought for PHYSICAL items (ex. shirts or prints). Absolutely NO reselling of digital files is ever allowed in any way.

results.title: Live, Laugh and Love Handmade Wood  Display Silhouette Decoration  sfam006
results.description:
Live, Laugh and Love Handmade Wood  Display Silhouette Decoration
 
This is a 1/8" thick,  hand cut wood display silhouette with a special message, “Live, Laugh and Love”.  Display it on your desk or a place easily visible to visitors.  It is cut from 1/8" Baltic Birch and includes a base of Eastern White pine for easy display.  The silhouette measures 6 3/4" x 9"  including the base. It is painted on both sides with several coats of a deep black color paint.  It is completely handmade in the USA.

My silhouettes and wall hangings make an interesting and unique addition to any decor at home or office.  They are painted on both sides and the edges with several coats of a deep black color paint so they can be displayed in any orientation.   Display the silhouettes on a desk, shelf or bookcase.  We like to display them on window sills or on the top of the bottom sash of a double hung window. The natural back light of the outside really highlights them.  Many people have purchased our silhouettes for wedding cake toppers or reception table decorations.  In addition they have provided table decorations for many special events.  You can also use them as a wall decoration by not using the base and with a small hanger or adhesive mount them on the wall.  They make welcomed unique gifts for those on your shopping list and with our large variety of designs I am sure we have a silhouette that anyone can appreciate.

 A word about how I make these silhouettes.  They are totally hand cut on a scroll saw, sanded and then hand painted.  No automatic cutting machines are used and so we classify our silhouettes as handmade.  If this is of interest to you please take the extra time in reviewing our over 400 different designs.
 
 To save on shipping costs and to allow you to use the silhouette alone as a wall or furniture decoration the base and the silhouette are shipped unattached. To permanently attach the base to the silhouette just put a dab of household or common wood glue in the slot of the base and carefully insert the silhouette.
 
  We typically ship within one business day after receipt of your payment or the clearing of your check.
 
 With any of our items you must be 100% satisfied or you may return the item within 14 days for a full refund including all shipping charges. We do ask that you contact us by email before returning an item which includes the name of the item and your preference regarding receiving the refund.
 
 Our 1/8" silhouettes are shipped first class USPS mail in a padded envelope.  It is our experience the for our packages USPS first class is just as fast as USPS priority.  Shipping charges are as displayed on the items listing and we do ship worldwide.  We do combine shipping cost on multiple item purchases.

results.title: Die cry hate embroidery hoop art, craftivism, inspirational embroidery, anti Live Laugh Love, misanthrope gift, funny embroidery
results.description:
Die
Cry
Hate

This anti Live Laugh Live embroidery hoop art would be perfect for inspiring your day. 
 
This lovely piece is made at Hoop Doggy Dog’s home studio in Manchester, England. It was lovingly hand-stitched by Laura (Chief Bossy Pants at Hoop Doggy Dog). 
 
This item would make a great gift – but don’t forget about yourself, you deserve a treat too!
 
 
❖ Materials:
 
The design will be completely hand-stitched on cotton stretched over an embroidery hoop and left unbacked to show off the chaos underneath the pretty!

The embroidery has been embellished with sequins which have been sewn on. 

 
❖ Construction:
 
The hoop is made from wood. The finished hoop is very light and easy to hang on a wall.
 
This item is made in a home under a cat's dictatorship, but we do try to ensure he has no contact with the materials we use, or the finished products.
 
 
❖ Dimensions:
 
The hoop is x inches in diameter.
 
 
❖ Shipping:
  
All parcels have a proof of posting receipt, but we do not generally use a tracking service due to the high costs in relation to the goods. If you require that your order is signed for upon delivery, please convo us first and we can inform you of any additional costs.
 
Sometimes things go wrong with deliveries which is out of our control...
• UK customers, if you haven't received your item after 5 working days of receiving the shipping notification, please get in touch.
 
• International customers, if you haven't received your order after 28 working days of receiving the shipping notification, please get in touch.
 
We cannot be held responsible for items that go missing in the post, but should this happen we will try our best to rectify the situation.
 
 
❖ Refunds & Exchanges:
 
We put a lot of time and love into our work so we put a lot of care into packaging them safely so they make it to you safely. If the order arrives damaged, please get in touch. We may ask for photo of the damage to be sent so we can see if we need to adapt the way we package certain items or change the method that we send those orders.
 
Please note that custom orders cannot be cancelled, refunded or exchanged once the order is made, unless the item is found to be faulty.
 
Finally, please do contact us before leaving any negative feedback - we will do all we can to resolve any dissatisfaction.
 
 
❤ Thank you for supporting handmade, we truly appreciate your business.
 
Let’s get social! Follow us on social media for updates:
 
★ Instagram
www.instagram.com/lauraaaah_hoopdoggydog
www.instagram.com/chris_hoopdoggydog
www.instagram.com/hoopdoggydogshop
 
★ Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/hoopdoggydog

results.title: Keep Calm & Drink Tea Teacup - Fine Bone China Teacup and Saucer with Embellished with Platinum Silver
results.description:
Give this stunning pair of teacups and saucers as a very special fine bone china wedding gift. The Mrs/Always Right cup and saucer is decorated with oodles of swirling confetti in soft pinks, corals and real rose gold. A wedding keepsake and gorgeous gift with a contemporary humorous twist designed and manufactured in our home county Staffordshire. Staffordshire, affectionately known as The Potteries is the world capital of quality ceramics and its also where we had our beautiful packaging made too! 

This tea cup measures 8.5cm in diameter (as its widest dimension) and is 7.5cm tall. The saucer is 14.2 in diameter. Weight is approx 300g. The tea cup and saucer are supplied in a presentation box.

results.title: Laundry Room Wash Fold Dry Decor - Laundry Room Decal -  Wall Vinyl Decal- Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

* Can be purchased with or without hearts as shown in picture 2. If you would like the hearts included, in the notes to seller box at checkout, please include with hearts. If no note is added, you will be sent just the saying without hearts as shown in picture 1. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. results.title: Any Occasion Handmade Card, Blank Inside
results.description:
Handmade Any Occasion Card with matching envelope. 

This simple and elegant Handmade Card is perfect for almost any occasion. The card is made from turquoise Japanese Linen card stock. “Live Well Laugh Often Love Much” is stamped on white cardstock and embellished with black and white washi tape and gem stone bling.

This card is blank on the inside so you can write your own special message. 

Measures approximately 4.25 x 5.5 inches

Made Of: Turquoise Japanese Linen card stock, white card stock, washi tape, black stamp, gem stone bling. 

The card will arrive with a white shimmer envelope and will be in a clear archival bag for safe storage.

***Cards can be bundled together for a lovely gift set, which makes a great gift idea!
